description: Transforms annotations, comments, and findings into crisp, argumentative talking points suitable for essay outlines. Produces one-sentence action-oriented claims.
researcher_question: How can I transform this annotation into a sharp talking point for my essay?

talking_point.text: string - one sentence, crisp argumentative claim

extraction.core_question: How to transform this into a sharp essay talking point?
extraction_steps: ANALYZE SOURCE: Understand the annotation, finding, or comment
IDENTIFY CORE INSIGHT: Extract the key argumentative claim
SHARPEN: Make it action-oriented, assertive, one sentence
CONTEXTUALIZE: Consider how it fits the broader essay arc
extraction.special_instructions: One sentence only. Active voice. Present tense. No hedging. Make claims, not questions.
